/** @jsxImportSource @emotion/react */ import { css } from "@emotion/react"; import React from "react"; import Accordion from "react-bootstrap/Accordion"; import { formatNumberWithTwoDigits } from "./RepeatComponent"; import { Button, Cell, Grid, Table, TableBody, TableCell, TableHead, TableHeader, TableRow, Text, VFlow, } from "bold-ui"; interface AccordionFinalSummaryProps { numAccordion: number; } export function AccordionFinalSummary(props: AccordionFinalSummaryProps) { const { numAccordion } = props; return ( Mesa {formatNumberWithTwoDigits(numAccordion)} Unidade(s) Produto Pre√ßo Total 1 Coca Cola R$3,00 R$3,00 3 Batata Frita (200g) R$15,00 R$45,00 5 Hamburguer Double Bacon R$30,00 R$150
Total: R$ ); } const divStyles = css` width: 100%; overflow: auto; `; const totalStyles = css` color: rgb(208, 30, 41); font-weight: bold; font-size: 1.25rem; `;
